name: Organized
description: I believe that in order to achieve good objectives, you have to plan the steps well to reach a set goal.

name: Autodidact
description: I like to be learning on my own, it is never enough to stop acquiring new knowledge

name: Team Player
description: I think it's good to have a good relationship with the team you work with and above all share knowledge to grow together

name: Responsible
description: I always try to do the best possible job to deliver the requirements on time, estimating logical delivery dates, thus going hand in hand with good planning.

name: Remote Work
description: I feel that remote work is not an impediment to doing a good job, on the contrary, I feel even more responsibility to work from home and in this way I am usually very dedicated to work.

name: Critical thinking
description: I enjoy the brainstorming that usually arises from a technical conversation, I like to listen and give my opinion to reach the best possible resolution depending on the technical issue being discussed.

name: Optimism
description: I always see things in a positive way trying to find a good side to it.

name: Empathy
description: I empathize a lot with the team members, their human side is very important from my point of view.
